p: The results of the maceration extraction yield ( Table 1) show that acetone is the best extraction solvent, with an average of 20.43 ± 0.23% for Passiflora, 20.95 ± 0.15% for Physalis and 20.01 ± 0.18% for Solanum, followed by water, with averages of 19.53 ± 0.23%, 18.67 ± 0.14% and 18.32 ± 0.19% for Passiflora, Physalis and Solanum, respectively. The highest extraction in Solanum was found in the leaves for all solvents used ( p < 0.05).
